get_data1.p1: Itri.living is a Swiss hospitality services company (under incorporation) dedicated to providing unbeatable value and authentic travel experiences in exotic places.
get_data1.p2: With a mission to offer a minimum 50% price discount compared to similar options, Itri.living focuses on delivering exceptional value without compromising on quality.
get_data1.p3: Through long-term partnerships with property developers at the very early stages, we offer tailor-made, bespoke hospitality resorts that align with our core values of authenticity, well-being, and exceptional value for money. We have secured a partnership with a Moroccan developer to develop for our brand management, by summer 2030, four exclusive resorts, the 1st one set to open mid-2027.
get_data1.p4: In the interim, Itri.living will curate select existing accommodations from existing resorts, offering fair value to our community while we await the launch of our custom-built destinations.
get_data1.title: Itri Living

get_data2.p1: At Itri.Living, accommodations rights to our resorts portfolio are digitally represented as ERC-721 Tokens.
get_data2.p10: This allows for maximum transaction volume for the Itri Token,
get_data2.p13: When Itri Tokens change wallets, a fee is paid - This is the basis of our income model: we make money when you make money!
get_data2.p15: When Itri tokens are used to book a stay in one of our Resorts, no trading fees are paid, and you enjoy the exceptional value for money you deserve. Our booking solution NiteBook (under development) will take you through an effortless and intuitive booking journey.
get_data2.p19: These are what we know are valuable experiences for our community.
get_data2.p3: Itri tokens have the following utility/characteristics:
get_data2.p5: Itri Tokens will be traded (bought & sold)
get_data2.p6: on a selected Exchange(s) (centralized and/or DeFi).
get_data2.p8: One Itri token equals one accommodation night,
get_data2.title: Tokenised Accommodation Rights:

get_data3.b1: Benefits to be found in all our
get_data3.b5: State-of-the-art facilities and services on site including pools, fitness amenities, a wellness center, and more.

get_data4.c10: At Itri.living, our income model is not solely based on accommodation services we offer. Our margin comes also from the fees we earn when you trade Itri tokens on Exchanges.
get_data4.c11: So when you make money, we make money with you.
get_data4.c4: At Itri.living, we are able to offer exceptional value for money to our community through a combination of the following:
get_data4.c5: By partnering with property developers that already secured the property resort land early-on, at reasonable prices.
get_data4.c6: While making no compromise on security, comfort, and authenticity, we are able to secure the best construction prices for the resort and the accommodation units.
get_data4.c7: Having chosen a fully digital model and relying on the strength of our community, we are able to save on marketing and client acquisition costs.
get_data4.c8: For the above reasons, developing custom-made resorts and choosing a fully digital model allow us to limit our costs and pass-on the savings on to our Community.
get_data4.c9: However, the most important factor is our strategy to make money only when you make money, thereby aligning our interests with yours, in a win-win philosophy.

get_data5.d3: Each stay is more than a simple escape—it’s an opportunity to connect with nature, immerse yourself in local culture, and create lasting memories that embody the true essence of travel.
get_data5.d4: At Itri Living, your journey is illuminated by ‘Itri’ the star that represents our dedication to authentic and meaningful experiences.

get_data6.e2: Please note that we currently do not have any management contracts with operational RESORTS.
get_data6.e3: However, WE HAVE PARTNERED WITH A DEVELOPER TO START construction IN AN AMAZING BEACH-FRONT LOCATION:
get_data6.e4: Itri Residences Nador, situated on the Mediterranean Sea.
get_data6.e5: THREE OTHER projects are under consideration to become operational BY SUMMER 2030.
get_data6.e6: While we aim to develop a diverse catalog of properties for Itri COMMUNITY, there is no guarantee that these projects will be built IN-TIME, or that they will be the specific ones mentioned.
get_data6.e7: We are committed to making every effort to offer a rich selection of

get_data7.f12: Each Tura NFT holder will have the opportunity to purchase up to 30 accommodation days every year (ie : itri tokens), at our partner resorts, at a significant discount to market price (Between 50% to 80% off the market value).
get_data7.f14: We pledge to launch our first tailor-made resort, developed by our partner developer to our specific standards, by summer 2027. Following this, we will make every effort to introduce one new resort each summer through 2030.
get_data7.f16: By the summer 2026 holiday season, we will present temporary accommodation offers, in carefully curated existing resorts. While these may not include all our exclusive services, they will always feature a minimum 50% discount off the market value.
get_data7.f3: Itri.living has developed a strategic partnership with Itri NFT project and its digital members club. This partnership offers Itri NFT holders the following benefits:
get_data7.f4: Each Tura NFT holder/digital club member will be able to purchase 30 tokens (issued by Itri.living) per year at a cost of 35 Sfr/token.
get_data7.f5: This means that Tura NFT holders will benefit from 30 days every year in any of our exclusive resorts at a cost of 35 Sfr/day. Of course, should they wish to, they can also trade their Itri tokens at the Nite Marketplace.
get_data7.f9: We are dedicated to ensuring that your Tura NFT ownership brings you exceptional value and exclusive opportunities.

dataFaq.question: What is Itri.Living?
dataFaq.answer: Itri Living is a Swiss hospitality services company (under incorporation) dedicated to providing unbeatable value and authentic travel experiences in exotic locations. By partnering with property developers early on, we create bespoke resorts that reflect our values of well-being, authenticity, and great value for money. Our first exclusive resort will open in 2027, with three more by 2030. In the meantime, we offer curated accommodations to our community.

dataFaq.question: How does Itri Living work?
dataFaq.answer: Itri Living operates on a membership model. Members can book stays at our curated resorts using tokens and enjoy exclusive benefits and discounts with each reservation.

dataFaq.question: What makes Itri Living unique?
dataFaq.answer: Our resorts will be designed to be environmentally friendly, combining eco-responsible architecture with local traditions. We offer immersive experiences focused on sustainability and authenticity, all at unbeatable prices.

dataFaq.question: What types of experiences does Itri Living offer?
dataFaq.answer: We offer a range of experiences: relaxation in spas, water sports, hiking, yoga, and cultural immersion, all with a strong focus on ecological and community engagement.

dataFaq.question: Where are Itri Living resorts located?
dataFaq.answer: Our first resort is set to open in 2027, with three more planned by 2030. Discussions are ongoing for locations. In the meantime, we curate accommodations at existing resorts, offering authentic experiences while awaiting the launch of our custom-built destinations.

dataFaq.question: Who are the partners of Itri Living?
How can I take advantage of the exclusive offers and discounts?

dataFaqHeader.description: If our Membership FAQs are not enough, feel free to book a call with us and we’ll be happy to assist you!
